homepage.title: Sylla Engineering and Construction
homepage.description: With a presence in the construction industry since 1989, formerly known as Nouvelle Entreprise Sylla (NES), we became Sylla Engineering and Construction in 2012. Econs embodies a genuine passion for construction and project delivery, backed by 36 years of expertise.
homepage.bodypage: Econs is headquartered in Senegal with subsidiaries across Africa (Benin, Ivory Coast, Rwanda) and Europe (France).

about.title: About us
about.description: ECONS LLC's expertise and capabilities are built on:
sub: Highly qualified professionals committed to exceeding client expectations while adhering to international standards
Cutting-edge construction equipment and technologies to deliver innovative solutions
about.description2: Driven by complete client satisfaction, ECONS LLC embraces these core values:
about.mot_de_fin: Building excellence - our approach to every challenge!

activities.title: Our Expertise
activities.publicWorks: Public works and infrastructure (roads, pipelines, civil engineering)
activities.technicalStaffDescription: Strategic partnerships across Benin, Ivory Coast, and Rwanda

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover our portfolio of successful constructions

cicd.title: Dakar International Cancer Center
cicd.description: Part of a network of radiotherapy centers for cancer treatment across Africa (Senegal, Benin, Rwanda)

rcc.title: Rwanda Cancer Center
rcc.description: Constructed in partnership with the Rwandan defense forces

waly.title: Waly Sakhir Gallery
waly.description: Luxury complex serving as showroom for designer Collé Sow Ardo

aramia.title: ARAMIA Residence
aramia.description: Premium residential development on 665 m² with basement and landscaped areas

ocean.title: Ocean Medical Center
ocean.description: Multidisciplinary clinic specializing in medical tourism, featuring penthouses and spa

contact.title: Contact us
contact.paragraph1: Thank you for your interest in our company. We're here to support your construction projects from concept to completion. For inquiries, please email us at {{email}}.
contact.paragraph2: We strive to respond to all messages within 24 hours.
